articles.description: England face Sri Lanka in the third and final one-day international in Colombo - follow live scores and updates.
articles.title: Sri Lanka vs England LIVE: Third ODI, Colombo - cricket score & updates

articles.description: Harry Kane is entering the final 18 months of his Bayern Munich contract, and the German champions are eager to keep the prolific striker, as German football writer Constantin Eckner explains.
articles.title: Harry Kane: How is England captain viewed in Germany as contract talks begin?

articles.description: The US federal agency says it will not play an immigration role at February's event in Milan-Cortina.
articles.title: US to send ICE agents to Winter Olympics, prompting Italian anger

articles.description: Pep Guardiola has apologised to new Premier League referee Farai Hallam if he "feels offended", having taken issue with the official following Manchester City's victory over Wolves on Saturday. But the Spaniard said he has to "defend my club and my players".
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Man City boss apologises to ref Farai Hallam but defends outburst

articles.description: Spain "will be the leader of the 2030 World Cup and the final of that World Cup will be held here" says the president of the country's football federation.
articles.title: World Cup 2030: Spain to host final, federation president says

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka says it is "trophy or nothing" after brushing aside teenage star Iva Jovic to reach the Australian Open semi-finals.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Aryna Sabalenka says it is 'trophy or nothing' after beating Iva Jovic to reach semi-finals

articles.description: Bournemouth have made 19-year-old Brazilian forward Rayan their second most-expensive signing. Who is he and how good can he be?
articles.title: Bournemouth: Why new Brazilian forward has potential to be 'one of best in world'

articles.description: Aston Villa make a fresh enquiry to re-sign former midfielder Douglas Luiz on loan as Unai Emery looks to bolster his options in the centre of the pitch.
articles.title: Aston Villa transfer news: Douglas Luiz keen on Aston Villa loan return

articles.description: England's prop problems continue in the run-up to the Six Nations with Harlequins' Fin Baxter ruled out of the tournament.
articles.title: Fin Baxter: England prop ruled out of Six Nations

articles.description: In-form Patrick Dorgu is still being assessed but he is likely to miss Manchester United matches with the injury he picked up against Arsenal.
articles.title: Manchester United's Patrick Dorgu to be out for weeks with hamstring injury
